H0.text: Saint Therese is associated with which town. Paris

H1.text: Saint Therese is associated with which town. Rome

H2.text: Saint Therese is associated with which town. Alencon

H3.text: Saint Therese is associated with which town. Lisieux

A4.text: Therese was born on Rue Saint-Blaise, in Alençon, France on 2 January 1873

A5.text: The city of Lisieux, where Thérèse Martin lived for the greater part of her life, is now a pilgrimage center visited by around one million visitors each year
